name: Christopher BERRY, Petitioner v. PA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE; Vincent Mooney, Warden Sci-Coal Township; Philadelphia District Attorney's Office, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Berry v. PA Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Christopher BERRY, Petitioner v. PA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE; Vincent Mooney, Warden Sci-Coal Township; Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of January, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
84 A.3d 1059
Christopher BERRY, Petitioner v. PA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE; Vincent Mooney, Warden Sci-Coal Township; Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, Respondents.
No. 189 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 31, 2014.
